task_17.description: Place the yellow tissue between the red cup and the blue cup
task_17.required_objects: yellow tissue, red plastic cup, blue plastic cup
task_17.initial_setup: The red cup is upright on the left side, 20 cm from the edge. The blue cup is upright on the right side, 20 cm from the edge. A green paper cup is tilted and resting on its side near the center.
task_17.final_state: The yellow tissue is flat and positioned between the red and blue cups, 10 cm from each. The green cup is upright on the far left corner.
